name: Hotel Tirolerhof

reviews.text: Excellent Holiday, Great base for skiing as we were able to store our ski boots in the hotel basement, great to finish off the day in using the spa facilities, extremely happy with our room which was a small double but had ample space, the food & stay at the hotel was most enjoyable. Well recommend.
reviews.title: Family Simpson

reviews.text: I stayed here with my family at Easter this year.
reviews.title: Great Spot!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was great, food yummy and the staff really friendly! The swimming pool and spa were great. My little brother and I enjoyed it as there was a jacuzzi and squirting jets in the big pool.
reviews.title: A Wonderful Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we went ski-ing , it was a short walk to the lifts so Mum and Dad didn't have to carry our stuff too far!
reviews.title: A Real Gem

reviews.text: The hotel was lovely and I hope to go back next year!!
reviews.title: A fantastic hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we arrived,we were greeted with a glass of wine and made welcomed. The hotel is situated only 5mins from the beautiful lake and shops. The dinner meal consisted of 4 courses and was of excellent taste and variety. In the morning,guests helped themselves to a good selection of hot and cold food and were offered tea or coffee. Ther rooms were kept very tidy and the beds and towels were always immaculately arranged for when you got back from the days out. Staff were very helpful and could talk different languages and if you wanted to know what the meal consisted of,they would explain what the meal consisted of. Highly recommend this hotel to stay at.
reviews.title: Very Good Hotel

reviews.text: This is the 2nd time that I have visitei Zell am See. I love this town and its neighborhood. It is one of the most beautiful places for me in the world. The hotel is vey nice, very helpful staff members. There was a welcome cocktail and a nice fire at the lobby. Rooms are extremely comfortable being able to use the Internet all the time. Highly recommended hotel!
reviews.title: Lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One of the best hotels we have ever been. Even if the hotel was fully booked they have time to everybody.Excellent food , staff and rooms.
reviews.title: Great hotel
A lovely hotel in a great location
reviews.text: Even we had to leave very early in the morning ,the breakfast was served (at 05.00)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was a very nice hotel. We had a standard room which was a reasonable size with comfortable beds and a balcony.
reviews.title: 4 star hotel 6 star quality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from a week in this beautiful hotel.This was our 3rd visit to celebrate our silver wedding as we knew we would not be disappointed.Lived up to our expectations and more.We were delighted to meet guests from our previous visit and will look forward to returning again.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very Clean, beautiful rooms, excellent service, very friendly and helpful staff, wellness centre and spa brilliant. Food fantastic choice exceptional breakfast and evening meal. Pay a visit yourself and enjoy the experience.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel Tirolerhof

reviews.text: We stayed at the wonderful Tirolerhof last year ( just the two of us ) Enjoyed it so much that we returned with my husband's 88 year old mother ( Nell ) and three of our friends .
reviews.title: Return to Zell - this time with Nell !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is well run with friendly helpful staff and superb food .It is in a very good location & Zell am See is a lovely place to spend a holiday ( especially at the Tirolerhof .
reviews.title: All you could ask for....and more

reviews.text: My husband and I reluctantly arrived home from this wonderful hotel last week.I can only reiterate previous good reviews. Old world charm hotel with tasteful decor.Bedrooms spacious, immaculate and very comfortable. We looked forward to reading the selection each morning for our delicious evening meal. An eating 'experience' beautifully presented. Staff were friendly, attentive and very helpful.
reviews.title: Hotel Tirolerhof - this is such a good hotel
Excellent hotel in a beautiful location
reviews.text: We booked the Tirolerhof based on previous reviews and its #1 ranking, we weren't disappointed.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the moment we arrived until the day we checked out, all of the staff were very friendly but more importantly professional. All areas of the hotel are spotlessly clean with housekeeping doing a great job with our bedroom and the turndown service while we were having our evening meal. We were in room 122 on the first floor in a junior suite, large bedroom with seating area, large bathroom and a balcony looking towards the lake and mountains. Had a fantastic view of the fireworks from the summer festival on our first Saturday night.
reviews.title: Fabulous Hotel

reviews.text: The meals in the restaurant are first class, fine dining at its best. As previous reviews have stated you are assigned a table for the duration of your stay. The evening menu is on the table every morning where you select what you want at night. Service is very slick between courses as the kitchen know exactly what and when to prepare, waiting staff appear to have tablets that notify the kitchen when you finish a course.
reviews.title: Disappointed

reviews.text: Used the pool more to relax rather than a workout as its not huge but all I was looking for. Take the shuttle bus to the private lido for a swim in the lake. Large private grassed area with a manned log cabin providing towels and drinks. Plenty of sun beds and parasols.
reviews.title: A great spot for families!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A first class hotel that deserves its #1 status.
reviews.title: Superb Hotel !

description: The Tirolerhof is a quietly located spa hotel in the centre of Zell am See, at the foot of the Schmittenhöhe mountain and only a few steps away from Lake Zell.The newly renovated Elements Panorama Spa on the fourth floor offers a wide range of wellness applications and beautiful views of the mountains and the lake.Bathing and sauna pleasures are also offered in the 1,000 m² Tirolerhof Aquarena, which features a swimming pool, a Jacuzzi, a relaxation room with water beds.
